job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Optomi in partnership with a major sports association who is looking for a junior level Full Stack Developer. This association is looking for someone eager and willing to have all hands on deck. The ideal candidate will work well in a collaborative environment and obtain great communications skills. Join a team of proud, passionate, and caring people that together share their diverse talents and backgrounds to serve the members of the association.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Must Have Skills/ Requirements:&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s Degree (B.S.) in Computer Programming, Computer Science or related field.&nbsp;</li><li>2+ years experience.</li><li>Full stack development experience.</li><li>Has worked with Ruby on Rails.&nbsp;</li><li>Test driven development.</li><li>Web frameworks.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>What The Candidate Will Enjoy:</strong></p><ul><li>Working for a major sports association to design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software!</li><li>Managing individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables!</li><li>Helping build a world-class team and cultivate innovation!</li><li>Leading designs of major software components, systems, and features!</li><li>Mentoring and training other team members on new technologies, design techniques, and coding standards!</li></ul><p></p>
